title: TypeTogether to have an exhibition in Argentina
content:
Submitted by [Miss Tiffany](http://web.archive.org/web/20080516072117/http:/www.typophile.com/user/108 "View user profile.") : 25.Apr.2008 12.41pm 

Veronika Burian, partner at TypeTogether: “We are proud to announce that TypeTogether ( [www.type-together.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20080516072117/http:/www.type-together.com/ "www.type-together.com")) is opening its exhibition in Rosario, Argentina, on May 21st, 2008. The exhibition presents some of the best known typefaces that TypeTogether has released and a few font families that are still under development. It will also focus on the design process for text typefaces, from conception to reader. The exhibition features typefaces designed by: Veronika Burian, José Scaglione, Eduardo Berliner, Bart Blubaugh, David Brezina, Pilar Cano and Nicolien van der Keur.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080516072117im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/typetogether_3978.gif)

For more information about other upcoming exhibits, lectures and workshops as well as access to a freely distributed licence for one of our fonts (Cora) is available in our April newsletter” ( [http://www.type-together.com/mailing/2008-04.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20080516072117/http:/www.type-together.com/mailing/2008-04.html "http://www.type-together.com/mailing/2008-04.html")).
author: Miss Tiffany
